summary: Hoping to impress a beautiful senorita, an American visiting Mexico trains with a famous Mexican bullfighter and becomes a competing bullfighter himself.
cast: Robert Stack|Joy Page|Gilbert Roland|Virginia Grey|John Hubbard|Katy Jurado|Antonio Gomez|Ismael Pérez|Rodolfo Acosta|Ruben Padilla|Darío Ramírez|Luis Briones|Luís Castro|Ricardo Torres 'Bombita'|Alfonso Ramírez Calesero|Andres Blando|Antonio Velasquez|Juan Estrada|Manuel Jiménez 'Chicuelo'|Ward Bond|Félix Briones|Paul Fix|Gerald Mohr
title: El torero y la dama
